0: d ccc d ccc d ccc d ccc d ccc d ccc ||ccc ddd ccc ddd ccc ddd ccc ddd ||ccd ccd ccd ddc ddc ddc ddc ccd ddc

You are now going to learn the C key, which is your first time typing a Bottom Row letter. To type the C key, move your middle finger down from the D key, which it rests on when not typing. You may feel like using your â˜ž index finger... Don't! Developing good habits and proper technique now will pay off later!

Type the N key by moving your index finger down from the J key.
